title: League won't install for me
body: I had to uninstall LoL because every time i clicked the shortcut, it came up with unexpected error please check logs. So i went to the website and downloaded it again. Every time i click the new shortcut the league of legends splash comes up for a second and then nothing. Please help! This happen to anyone else?

replies.body: Yeah that's happened to ALL Mac users. If you uninstalled it then that's your mistake :L The rest of us are just waiting for Riot to post something about the problem.
Brillient, Thanks for the help anyway
